name: Make it Count (Sstaro)
description:
Status: Game in Development

"If you´re skilled enough to survive the challenges that await you, I´ll set you free from your curse" 

Those were the last words you remember before you  being left with nothing  but a bow and an arrow in an unknown place. The only thing you can do is to go forward and trust your instincts. "I don´t know why, but I believe in this words"

Gameplay:

Use your only arrow to defeat your enemies while you complete the dungeon so you can get free and discover the mystery behind this fortuneless situation.
